divs: Sighting DetailsI was stargazing, laying on my deck enjoying the view of the galaxy and I eventually saw stars that were stationary, start to move in a certain direction. I saw a couple of them. Sometimes they would change direction which would rule out satellite activity. They seemed much higher than the distance of satellites as well. I would like to discuss this with others since there was another posting on this site today regarding the same thing. my e m ai l is R E G A L 1 1 1 at comcast. Net. Please email me at regal111@comcast.net
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 18th 2005
Summary: Stars in sky standing still then moving in a certain direction
